answers.content: e1210. The sign ahead is really confusing
Yes, your signature is really complicated
At the corner of Hudson Street
Then I’ll give you directions from now on.
e129. I’m going out for a light lunch after reviewing this paper
When did he leave?
He can come with us
I’ll catch up with you at the café
e128. Let’s postpone our plans for the weekend until the weather report is confirmed.
Oh, is there still a chance of rain?
No, I’m afraid not
When was it put off?
e127. Let’s take a quick look at these documents prior to the meeting
Good thinking. I want it to be well organized
Yes, the meeting was proceeding very quickly
Sorry, I didn’t bring my glasses
e126. I try to eat less when I am on a tight schedule
Yes, I saw that too on a diet program
I also get drowsy if I have a big meal
The restaurant is so crowed whenever I go there.
e125. The Service Department fell short of operators for the upcoming holiday season
Yes, they will be closed for the holidays
Yes, the Service Department was still operational
So, I’ve already posted a temporary job opening in the classifieds
e124. Just give our office a ring when you return to arrange an appointment
Try the jewelry shop at the corner
Yes, that’s nice to hear
All right then, again, what was your number?
e123. That’s the dealer where I got my branch-new car
I know they give better deals than at any other shop
They have a special weekend rental rate.
Yes, mine is a sedan
e142. I’m considering signing up for the Society of Computer Engineers
Yes, the IT training courses were worth taking
The computer industry is picking up nowadays
It might do some good in making a career move
e121. It might be strange to you, but you are awfully familiar
Yes, she is acting a bit strange
My family watched a horror movie together
That’s what I was thinking. Have we met?
e102. Marcus didn’t say he would repair the security system, did he?
It’s for the Safety Committee
Do you have the password?
Yes. He’ll be here to do the work soon
e101. Wasn’t your vacation supposed to start on May 13th?
To a beautiful island
I won’t be disappointed
Yes, but I postponed it
e118. Do you want me to pick up a video before or after we eat?
Yes, you should pick up the food
I think I could wait until after
I already saw the video
e117. Do you prefer one or two sugars in your coffee?
No sugar, please
I usually have a cup of coffee in the morning
There are enough copies
e116. Would you like to book a morning flight or an afternoon one?
Yes, it is a newly released book
I want to get an early start
Twice a day
e115. Are you going to live in company housing, are you planning to rent an apartment near the company?
Actually, I can’t afford to rent an apartment
I’m interested in moving to another department
I already applied for the company
e114. Will we depart for the airport early in the morning, or in the afternoon?
I have a plane to catch at five
We’ll leave right after lunch
We’d better take the subway to get there.
e113. Has Carol signed the contract, or is she still checking the terms?
I heard she accepted all the conditions
I think the contract is not good in the long term
Yes, she sent it yesterday.
e112. Should we hire new employees for the Accounting Department or the Shipping Department?
I think the Accounting Department is severely shorthanded
We hire new staff from the employment agency
Yes, the shipment just went out
e111. Do you want to meet Saturday or Sunday?
yes, we meet every weekend
Because I’m very busy this weekend
Sunday sounds fine
e1010. Don’t you like to go and watch baseball games at the stadium?
Sure, it was a very exciting match
Of course, I love watching sporting events
The new stadium is very comfortable for baseball fans
e109. You can drop by the post office on the way to work, can’t you?
Sorry, I haven’t even had a chance to stop by there
I think I can. What can I do for you?
Yes, I will post it in the office
e108. Weren’t you supposed to have left for the meeting by now?
Yes, he left an hour ago
Don’t worry. It was postponed
I will meet him later
e107. The plot of this movie is very interesting, isn’t it?
I saw the movie yesterday
No, I think it’s overdramatic
Yes, it was packed with many people
e106. Didn’t Mr. Farley ask you to make the order today?
No, I can’t make it
Yes, but Mary did it instead
Yes, it is in the right order
e105. Amelia picked up her baggage at her final destination, didn’t she?
She checked in at the railway station
She said she lost her bag on her way to the hotel
That’s the first thing she did when she arrived
e104. That building down the street has been available for a year, hasn’t it?
Yes, but it was leased a few days ago
No, our office is downtown
Because the street is crowed
e103. Haven’t you made an appointment with the dentist yet?
If the dentist wants the patient’s records
No, I changed my mind
Because it’s an important appointment
e102. Marcus didn’t say he would repair the security system, did he?
It’s for the Safety Committee
Do you have the password?
Yes. He’ll be here to do the work soon
e101. Wasn’t your vacation supposed to start on May 13th?
To a beautiful island
I won’t be disappointed
Yes, but I postponed it
e82. Why didn’t you call me last night?
Yes, I made a call
I think it will be tomorrow
I was very busy working on a project
s81. Why is the bank closed?
I heard there is a strike on
It’s a waste of money
Yes, right across from the public library
e98. Are you going to hire temporary workers to get this project finished by the deadline?
Because we’re behind schedule
I wish we could, but we don’t have the budget for it
No, they’re all regular employees
e97. Has the team followed up the suggestion mentioned at the last meeting?
Yes, I followed him all day
Great, I thought you would
Yes, everyone’s doing their part
e96. Do you enjoy yourself at the housewarming party last night?
I had a great time there
We need some miscellaneous items for the party
Actually, I’m not feeling well
e95. Did you pay the bills with cash yesterday?
I was charged fifty dollars
No, I paid with my credit card
No, I’d like to cash this check
e94. Am I doing something wrong?
It’s the wrong way
Yes, everything’s okay
No, you’re doing fine
e93. Have you seen the folder that was sitting on my desk?
No, I believe he is older
Yes, I filled it in the cabinet
No, I didn’t see you there
e92. Is there an express bus to Chicago?
Yes, there is one every hour
No, the press wasn’t operating
I’m here to attend a seminar
e91. Do your language courses end soon?
Yes, in a couple of days
Chinese and French
You have to register by tomorrow
e810. Did they ever why the delivery was late?
It was due to bad weather
On May 25th
Interest rates are so high these days
e89. Why didn’t you tell me about the change made in the contract?
I didn’t know about it either
After I check with the manager
Thanks for telling me about it
e88. Why didn’t you show up at the reception for our new clients?
Something urgent came up at the company
No, I saw him there last night
I thought it was a very successful show
e87. Why did you purchase the more expensive cassette recorder?
No, I didn’t
It has more functions
The recorder can be bought at any electronics store
e86. Why do you prefer to use a guide?
I’ll guide you around the city if you’d like
I find it much more convenient
Actually, I could use a reference book
e85. Why are visitors not allowed on the site?
For safety reasons
It was allowed before
The site is for the new laboratory
e84. Why was the delivery delayed?
No, they delivered it
For about two hours
The heavy traffic slowed it down
e83. Why has the factory stopped operating the assembly line?
It’s disappointing me
We have worked for 30 years
It wasn’t profitable
e82. Why didn’t you call me last night?
Yes, I made a call
I think it will be tomorrow
I was very busy working on a project
s81. Why is the bank closed?
I heard there is a strike on
It’s a waste of money
Yes, right across from the public library
e710. How much rent do you pay each month?
I got a six-month lease
I own the house
Seven hundred dollars
e79. How did you get to the seminar?
I rented a car
It was held at the Pizza Hotel
Actually, it was boring
e78. How can I register for the course?
I have to consider it first
Yes, it is due today
Fill out a form
e77. How long s the trip?
To the mountains
About two weeks
About ten centimeters long
e76. How is the book you bought the other day?
He is doing fine
It’s a page turner
I booked it already
e75. How many applicants applied for the position?
Send your cover letter by email
The position has already been filled
Eight people have sent in resume
e74. How much is the package tour to South Africa?
It comes to two hundred and fifty dollars
It includes airfare
At the airport
e73. How was it was possible for you to assemble that DVD player so fast?
It comes with a remote control
It will make it possible
Pedro helped me with it
e72. How does Nielson spell his name?
That’s what I’m talking about
Kate spilt the milk
N-I-E-L-S-O-N
e71. How many people have signed up for the seminar so far?
Wednesday would be good
Just thirty-five
Thanks for inviting me
nice
well
good
ea61. Who left these messages on my desk?
The District Manager, I guess
Not until next week
To notify you of today’s agenda
ea62. Who was chosen as the new partner?
Living-Home Uptown, Inc
I bet he can’t
Yes, they said they would
ea63. Who do you think will be chosen to lead the Accounting Department?
It’s a bit difficult to read
Pick me up at seven
It will be Lauren Kim
ea64. Who is suitable for the new position?
The new shirt really suits you
I’d like to recommend Edith
I prefer the old one
ea65. Who should I contact to order office supplies?
We need copy paper
Yes, he made the order
I will order them for you
ea66. Whose calculator is that on the desk?
Andrew calculated the figures
It belongs to David
The data proved accurate
ea68. Who were you talking to at the seminar yesterday?
The speeches were great
Yes, the seminar was very impressive
A manager from my old job
ea69. Who is Ms. Leon going to select as her assistant?
Yes, she was selected as a secretary
One of the new employees
Because we’re short-handed now
ea610. Who’s taking your places while you’re on holiday?
I’m thinking of going to the beach
Then we ‘ll  have to find a new place for it
Thomas promised me he would
ea51. What time are you available then?
He is not available either
Not until 7 o’clock
In a local park
ea52. What’s the fastest way to Seattle?
It’s an amazing city
Half an hour
Take Highway Ten
ea53. What did you do with the twenty-dollar gift certificate?
The certification is no longer valid
The gift was expensive
I gave it to my daughter yesterday
ea54. What are your plans for tonight?
At nine o’clock
I have a meeting with clients
Of course, I planned that
ea55. What are you going to take on the trip?
I had a very nice trip
I will be going this weekend
Nothing much. Just the regular stuff
ea56. What will we keep in our warehouse?
I think we’ve got many items in the storage room
It’s for our new products
Yes, we have a house in the suburbs
ea57. What do you think is the best way to get downtown?
It’ll take about half an hour
The subway is best with this traffic
Just several blocks from here
ea58. What was the reason for your visit to Paris?
It was a business trip
I stayed there for two weeks
I had a very pleasant time in Paris
ea59. Which insurance company provides us with better conditions?
I think it won’t be cover all the conditions
I’m sure Mega Corporation is our supplier
The C.Q Company does, I believe
ea510. What’s wrong with this printer?
Have you checked the plug
Sure, you can borrow mine
I think he’s a bit under the weather
ea41. When did your boss accept your cost reduction proposal?
I put it in the mailbox
It will cost more in five years
Two days ago
ea42. When did the board approve the change in the benefits policy?
No, he didn’t say okay
Sometime last week
Because the policy has been changed a lot
ea43. When did the bank say your mortgage application has been approved?
She said the application has been rejected
They didn’t mention the date
I will approve it soon
ea44. When does the company plan to hire new employees?
For senior positions
In about a month
At the job fair
ea45. When did Ms. Olson send this fax to Hong Kong?
At about five o’clock
Four pages
She took at ten p.m. flight
ea46. When will they start to install the new computers?
You should restart your computer
They will be here tomorrow
My computer was upgraded last month
ea47. When will the report be ready?
I should have it for you in an hour
Don’t worry. I’m ready to go now
It’s more complicated than I expected
ea48. When do you expect the executive to return from their field trip?
The boss is away on vacation for three days
I was told that they had a great time
Before the end of the day at the latest
ea49. When was the last time you drove to work?
Because I usually take the subway to work
A week ago. Why?
I arrived here at nine o’clock this morning
ea410. When can you come to repair the photocopier?
Yes, I can
After three p.m.
At the repair shop
ea31. Where can I find winter gloves?
In the sportswear section
No, I couldn’t find it yet
It’s twenty dollars
ea32. Where should I put this weekly report?
John will report it
To copy it
They’re kept in cabinet C
ea33. Where do we usually purchase our office equipment?
30 days at best
Yes, Michael is in charge of that
At a store called Good Will
ea34. Where are the pictures you bought?
About three weeks
My co-workers
On my desk
ea35. Where should I put Ms. Stone’s suitcase?
Yes, you should
In her office
In an hour
ea36. Where has the accounting staff been all afternoon?
I placed it in your drawer
Maybe at the weekly meeting
Not until afternoon
ea37. Where can I find a projector for tomorrow’s meeting?
The next project will be decided tomorrow
There is one in the supply room
No, Mr. Klyman will make a presentation at the meeting
ea38. Where did you learn Chinese?
I’m at the corner restaurant
I don’t like Chinese food
My mom’s from there
ea39. Where is the convention going to be held next year?
The convention was very informative
It has not been decided yet
Yes, they expect more participants next year
ea310. Could you tell me where a flower shop is around here?
There is one down the street
Sorry, but I don’t like flowers too much
No, it’s located at the intersection
a269. How about joining us for lunch?
The employee cafeteria’s downstairs
I’d like to very much
I didn’t have time for breakfast
a271. Would you mind if asked you your age?
That’s nice of you
Not at all
Certainly
a272. How long a trip is it from here to our Cairo office?
About twelve hours
About seven thousand miles
In Egypt
a273. Who are you sending that email for?
The boss asked me to
The boss. He’s expecting it
The boss. He asked me to
a274. Who are you sending that email to?
The computer
My new client
More stamps
a275. Are we going to be offered stock options next year?
Yes, stocks should go up next year
Yes, that’s what the boss said
No, but maybe next year
a277. Can you put in some overtime next week?
I can start work at four o’clock
Sure. I’ll put it in her next week
It shouldn’t be a problem
a278.  How much father is it?
About thirty minutes
About thirty dollars
About thirty kilometers
a279. Have you decided to ask for that transfer?
I’m putting in for vacation soon
I have to think about it some more
Yes, you could be right
a2710. Will I be reimbursed for my expenses on that business trip?
Yes, if you give us your receipts
Yes, business trips can be expensive
If you can afford it
a258. Why haven’t we begun the conference?
We’re having the meeting in my office
We’re still waiting for Mr. Carter to arrive
It shouldn’t take too long
a259. Hello. Uh. Who are you?
Fine, thank you
The new secretary
Downtown
a2510. Whose computer can I use?
Ms. Hoffman’s
The blue one
Sorry, I need it now
a262. How come you’re late?
There was a lot of traffic
No, I’ll be there on time
Yes, I eat very quickly
a263. Did you remember to invite everybody?
Thank you, but I can’t come
Yes, I sent the invitations yesterday
I remember everyone I’ve ever met
a264. Have we placed all the newspaper ads?
Yes, they’ve all gone out
It should be great for sales
Yes, I picked up the newspaper
a265. When will the auditors be leaving?
An hour ago
They’re going now
For an hour
a266. Why don’t we take a fifteen-minute break?
No, I didn’t break the plate
It’s working just fine
Good. I need to make a call
a268. Where do you come from?
Canada
The mailroom
Only a few minutes ago
a269. How about joining us for lunch?
The employee cafeteria’s downstairs
I’d like to very much
I didn’t have time for breakfast
a2410. Have you checked your email today?
I can give you a check
Yes, it is a slow connection
No, I’ll check it later
a251. When does your flight leave?
From the airport
From Gate 23
a252. Have we received that fax yet?
I’ve got it right here
In about an hour
I’ll fax it now
a253. Ms. Pak, is it? How do you do?
It’s my mistake
I’m a lawyer
How do you do?
a254. Isn’t it time for our meeting?
Sometimes I have meat
A quarter to three
Yes, but it’s been rescheduled
a255. Is the boss in a good mood?
Yes, but he’ll be right back
I’ve seen him smiling all morning
No, he’s in the cafeteria
a257. Aren’t we opening an office in Tokyo?
It’s open from nine to five
No, I’m not going to the office today
That’s what I’ve been told
a258. Why haven’t we begun the conference?
We’re having the meeting in my office
We’re still waiting for Mr. Carter to arrive
It shouldn’t take too long
a259. Hello. Uh. Who are you?
Fine, thank you
The new secretary
Downtown
a2510. Whose computer can I use?
Ms. Hoffman’s
The blue one
Sorry, I need it now
a241. What are your hours today?
Sorry, I don’t have a watch
We’re open from nine to five
In ten minutes
a242. Where can I make a phone call?
There’s a pay phone around the corner
It’s on the bus
Meet me at the library
a243. What time did you start this morning?
At 7:00 p.m.
In the office
At 8:00 a.m.
a244. Which color do you prefer?
It’s on my computer
The orange one is nice
Can we do it again?
a245. Have you met the new secretary?
No, not yet
She is in the office today
Her name is Alice
a246.  How many times a week do you play golf?
At least three times
It’s my favorite sport, too
At the club
a247.  Could I get you something else to eat?
I’m having a hamburger
No thanks, I’m full
Let’s go to the restaurant
a248. How much does the book weigh?
About two pounds
Biology
a249. Which movie would you like to watch?
It begins at 2 p.m.
The new one with Sean Connery
I think it costs about $7.00
a2410. Have you checked your email today?
I can give you a check
Yes, it is a slow connection
No, I’ll check it later
a229. Would you like to go to a movie with us after work?
Yes, we took a long walk
Yes, that’s a great idea
Yes, I worked all afternoon
a2210. Did you notice whether Ms. Kovacs was at the reception?
Yes, I took thorough notes
Yes, she was there
Yes, she received it
a231.  Where can I find Mr. Park?
He should be in his office now
Usually after lunch
a232. How many people work in this department?
Yes, it’s quite a big department
There are fifteen altogether
I’ve worked here for several years
a233. When will you be free to meet for lunch?
In the cafeteria on the second floor
It doesn’t cost anything
Next Monday is a good time
a234.  Did you buy that newspaper downstairs?
Yes, we’ll need some more paper
Yes, at the newsstand in the lobby
Yes, we said good-bye
a235. When will the new assistant manager start work?
In the office down the hall
Next week, I think
She has a lot of experience
a237.  Is there a discount on this furniture?
Yes, I can give you twenty-five percent off the regular price
Yes, we counted it last night
Yes, this is furniture
a238. Why hasn’t Mr. Moreno signed those papers yet?
He buys the newspaper every morning
Because he hasn’t had a chance to read them
No. he hasn’t
a2310. You aren’t still working for the same company, are you?
No, I got a new job about a month ago
No, I went there alone
No, it was a different computer
a219. Do you know what time the offices close?
I think everyone leaves by 5:30
Yes, the offices are closed
You really should buy some new clothes
a2110. Why did Ms. Chen call a meeting today?
It’s today
At 2:30, I think
Because we have to discuss the budget
a221. How often do you have to turn in financial reports?
Mrs. Gomez is our financial manager
Once every month
He’s a very good reporter
a222. How long does the bus ride take?
It’s only about fifteen minutes
It’s not a very big bus
It’s a very pleasant ride
a224. Where would you like to eat dinner?
As soon as I finish typing this document
We could try that restaurant across the street
Yes, I would like that very much
a225. Were you able to book a hotel for next week?
I’ve already read that book
Yes, I got a room at a nice place downtown
No, I didn’t
a227. How can I make an appointment with Ms. Lee?
She’s very happy about her new position
You won’t be disappointed
You should speak with her assistant
a228. How long do you plan to stay in Tokyo?
Only about three or four days
I haven’t been there in a long time
At one of the downtown hotels
a229. Would you like to go to a movie with us after work?
Yes, we took a long walk
Yes, that’s a great idea
Yes, I worked all afternoon
a2210. Did you notice whether Ms. Kovacs was at the reception?
Yes, I took thorough notes
Yes, she was there
Yes, she received it
The woman is looking around the microscope
She is looking for the microscope
She is looking through the microscope
The woman is looking at the microscope
a211. When did the director arrive?
Since this morning
At the airport
Late last night
a212. Do you know whose keys these are?
I left them on your desk
I think they’re Mr. Kim’s
They’re the keys to the closet door
a213. Where did you put the packages for Ms. Sato?
Ms. Sato is over there
They’re on her desk
She packed her bags
a214. Are you almost ready for the meeting?
I met him at the reception last night
No, it’s in the big conference room
Yes, I just have to finish typing these notes
a215. Where do you usually park your car?
There’s a beautiful park nearby
In the garage across the street
I had to take it to the mechanic last week
a216. When can I call you?
Tomorrow morning is a good time
Most people just call me Maria
My office is the best place to talk
a218. Who is going to meet Mr. Continue at the airport?
He’s at the airport
Mrs. Garcia will pick him up
At ten o’clock
a219. Do you know what time the offices close?
I think everyone leaves by 5:30
Yes, the offices are closed
You really should buy some new clothes
a2110. Why did Ms. Chen call a meeting today?
It’s today
At 2:30, I think
Because we have to discuss the budget
